vote.text: Amendment SA 2865 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2865 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Blumenthal. (consideration: CR 9/21/2012 S6671; text: CR 9/21/2012 S6671) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2865 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Blumenthal.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2865 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
